verses.verse: Brethren <S%G80><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> <S%G2532><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> be overtaken <S%G4301><s%> <S%G5686><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> fault <S%G3900><s%>, ye <S%G5210><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are spiritual <S%G4152><s%>, restore <S%G2675><s%> <S%G5720><s%> such an one <S%G5108><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of meekness <S%G4236><s%>; considering <S%G4648><s%> <S%G5723><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>, lest <S%G3361><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> be tempted <S%G3985><s%> <S%G5686><s%>.

Bear ye <S%G941><s%> <S%G5720><s%> one another's <S%G240><s%> burdens <S%G922><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> fulfil <S%G378><s%> <S%G5657><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if a man <S%G1536><s%> think himself <S%G1380><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> something <S%G5100><s%>, when he is <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%>, he deceiveth <S%G5422><s%> <S%G5719><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> let <S%G1381><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> prove <S%G1381><s%> <S%G5720><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> shall he have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5692><s%> rejoicing <S%G2745><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> shall bear <S%G941><s%> <S%G5692><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> burden <S%G5413><s%>.

Let <S%G1161><s%> him that is taught <S%G2727><s%> <S%G5746><s%> in the word <S%G3056><s%> communicate <S%G2841><s%> <S%G5720><s%> unto him that teacheth <S%G2727><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> good things <S%G18><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> he that soweth <S%G4687><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> shall <S%G2325><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> reap <S%G2325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> corruption <S%G5356><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> he that soweth <S%G4687><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> shall <S%G2325><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> reap <S%G2325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> let us <S%G1573><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be weary <S%G1573><s%> <S%G5725><s%> in well <S%G2570><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5723><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> in due <S%G2398><s%> season <S%G2540><s%> we shall reap <S%G2325><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, if we faint <S%G1590><s%> <S%G5746><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>.

As <S%G5613><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> opportunity <S%G2540><s%>, let us do <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5741><s%> good <S%G18><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men, especially <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3122><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them who are of the household <S%G3609><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>.
Ye see <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5628><s%> how large <S%G4080><s%> a letter <S%G1121><s%> I have written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> with mine own <S%G1699><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%>.

As many as <S%G3745><s%> desire <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to make a fair shew <S%G2146><s%> <S%G5658><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, they <S%G3778><s%> constrain <S%G315><s%> <S%G5719><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to be circumcised <S%G4059><s%> <S%G5745><s%>; only <S%G3440><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> they should suffer persecution <S%G1377><s%> <S%G5747><s%> for the execution stake <S%G4716><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> they themselves <S%G846><s%> who are circumcised <S%G4059><s%> <S%G5746><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> desire <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to have <S%G4059><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> circumcised <S%G4059><s%> <S%G5745><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they may glory <S%G2744><s%> <S%G5667><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5212><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> 'Elohim forbid <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5636><s%> that I <S%G1698><s%> should glory <S%G2744><s%> <S%G5738><s%>, save <S%G1508><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the execution stake <S%G4716><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> is crucified <S%G4717><s%> <S%G5769><s%> unto me <S%G1698><s%>, and I <S%G2504><s%> unto the world <S%G2889><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> b'ritmilah <S%G4061><s%> availeth <S%G2480><s%> <S%G5719><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%>, nor <S%G3777><s%> unb'ritmilah <S%G203><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> walk <S%G4748><s%> <S%G5692><s%> according to <S%G2583><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> rule <S%G2583><s%>, peace <S%G1515><s%> be on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

From henceforth <S%G3064><s%> let <S%G3930><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> trouble <S%G3930><s%> <S%G5720><s%> me <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3427><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> bear <S%G941><s%> <S%G5719><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> the marks <S%G4742><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>.

Brethren <S%G80><s%>, the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>. To <S%G4314><s%> the Galatians <S%G1052><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5648><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%>.
